body: Check out the http://earth-energy.eu/references.html page as well and scroll down to patents to see that the head of Ecologic Earth Energy (also Polish by the way) has been patenting things related to hydrocarbons like a mad man since the 1980s. I didn't find anything specifically for extracting hc from sand but the name "ecologic earth energy" and current projects in motion make it pretty clear that these guys are:
1) into making fat stacks of cash from innovative ways to extract energy
2) into the green lifestyle
You can read about Bohdan Zakiewicz from here http://www.earth-energy.eu/management.html
My man is neck deep into commercial US oil fields
